title: Rebecca Judd reveals she has a minor facial flaw but WON'T fix it with surgery
text:
She always looks picture perfect in her glamorous Instagram snaps.

But Rebecca Judd revealed on Monday that she actually has a minor facial flaw, but has no plans to fix it with cosmetic surgery.

The 36-year-old footy WAG made the confession while speaking to her co-host Katie 'Monty' Dimond on KIIS FM's 3pm Pick Up.

Happy just the way she is! Rebecca Judd revealed on Monday that she has a minor facial flaw, but has no plans to fix it with cosmetic surgery

The discussion began with Monty criticising people who use deviated septums as an excuse to get rhinoplasty surgery.

Rebecca agreed, saying it was 'usually guys' who get nose jobs and later dismiss it as a non-cosmetic procedure to fix their 'breathing issues'.

She then revealed: 'I actually do have a deviated septum! I have one nostril [that is] so much bigger than the other! Look, look at me!'

Can you tell? Rebecca revealed on KIIS FM's 3pm Pick Up that she has a deviated septum, which refers to when one nasal passage is smaller than the other

Rebecca explained that 'she wouldn't fix it' with surgery because she is perfectly happy with her nose as it is.

Deviated septums occur when the bone and cartilage that divide the nose in half are crooked, making one nasal passage smaller than the other.

Most people naturally have some degree of deviation, although severe deviation that makes breathing through the nose difficult requires surgery.

Fancy that! Deviated septums occur when the bone and cartilage that divide the nose in half are crooked. Pictured: Rebecca with her three-year-old twin sons Tom and Darcy

Rebecca's guest co-host, comedian Joel Creasey, then joked that he 'really want[s] to have a nose job just to follow in the footsteps of [his] hero Joan Rivers.'

He added: 'I want to have a botched nose job because my dream is to have a cover of WHO Weekly and a before-and-after shot with the caption, "Has he or hasn't he?"'

Rebecca jokingly replied: 'We could probably make that happen!'
description: She always looks picture perfect in her glamorous Instagram snaps.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
